text_block_list.text:
"――Shakur-san is a really smart kid. 
But she doesn't seem to understand the difference between 
'right' and 'true'..."
text_block_list.name: Elementary School Teacher

text_block_list.text:
"To be honest with you, even us teachers aren't sure how to 
handle her. She's isolated from the rest of the class, even getting 
into arguments with some of them."
text_block_list.name: Elementary School Teacher

text_block_list.text:
"We've tried our best to understand her, but... 
We can't get anywhere if she doesn't work with us..."
text_block_list.name: Elementary School Teacher

text_block_list.text:
"I'm sorry. She's always been like that... 
It's just the way she is, so it's fine just to leave her be and not 
get her riled up..."
text_block_list.name: Shakur's Mother

text_block_list.text:
(――Ever since I was a kid, I was “something incomprehensible”. 
For some reason, I was always the error to be corrected.)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
(Everything I heard was noise... We may have used the same 
language, but we couldn't communicate with each other. So I just 
gave it up.)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: (Then... I met my PC. It was like hearing someone else's voice for the first time. Programming was the first language I could really communicate in.)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
(So long as I had my partner, I could filter out the noise. And I 
found the optimal place to prove myself――I set my sights on 
Tracen Academy.)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
(I finished my ultimate partner, 『Parcae』, right after enrolling. 
The more data I fed in, the more accurate and precise its 
solutions got.)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
"I can't understand what Air Shakur thinks as she runs. She 
doesn't listen to instruction, she's uncooperative, and completely 
conceited... but..."

"I really don't want to run with Shakur-senpai... We're just too 
different, like we're from different worlds. Honestly, that scares 
me, but..."
"――'She wins', so she's amazing..."

(...It felt damn good. Those assholes had no choice but to shut up 
in the face of my victory. No more noise. So what if I aimed even 
higher...?)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
(――what if I won, again, and again? If I took the title reserved 
for the truly strong―― the Triple Crown―― for myself...!)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: (Once I did, I'd be..."                       ". Or so I thought.)
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Chasing Shakur after she finished training, I found her standing 
in the plaza.
choice_data_list: Shakur!

text_block_list.text:
！ 
You're... From that thing with the cop. 
The hell do you want?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: Your running today was awesome.

text_block_list.text:
Hah？
...Ah... Huh？
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=40>I could tell just how hard you've worked.</size>
<size=40>I could tell just how hard you've worked.</size>

text_block_list.text:
...Ngh. 
The hell? Don't just say stuff like that...
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Wait, did you really come out of your way just to say that? 
Yeah, yeah, thanks for that. Now scram.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
It wasn't just to say that. I called out to her because... 
Seeing her run made me want to get to know her better. 
Right, I came here to say――
choice_data_list: I want to be your trainer!
I want to be your trainer!

text_block_list.text:
...
Huh？
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
It was probably too sudden to ask. But the instant the words left 
my mouth, it dawned on me. That I was already considering this 
option from the moment we first met.

...Completely illogical. Oh, wait, you saying you fell in love at 
first sight? Sorry, but no. Not gonna hear out that kind of 
unfounded BS.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: Then give me a foundation.
Then give me a foundation.

text_block_list.text: ...What?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=35>Tell me what you wish for. The reason you run.</size>
<size=35>Tell me what you wish for. The reason you run.</size>

text_block_list.text:
What exactly do you think would happen if I told you? 
When I say 'foundation', I mean stuff like my abilities, or the 
conditions necessary to reach my goals. That kind of thing.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: If you tell me, I can help you.
If you tell me, I can help you.

text_block_list.text:
...How? How could you possibly... You really think you can put 
more work in than I have?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
From nutritional science to sports engineering, I know every 
theory and every data point. Tell me, what kind of 'help' could 
you possibly offer me?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: And there it is. Can't answer, can you? Just admit it. You're really just offering help to feel good about yourself, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Getting high off the idea of helping someone... the idea of saving 
someone. 
...Even though there's nothing anyone can do to help me.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
She unambiguously rejected me―― But the reason I was seeking 
was right there, between the lines... I had to press forward.
choice_data_list: I haven't done anything yet.

text_block_list.text: Huh?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=32>So what makes you think there's nothing I can do?</size>
<size=36>So why do you think there's nothing I can do?</size>

text_block_list.text:
Nggh, get off my back.
Listen...!
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
...Forget it. Follow me. 
I'll break it for you down numerically.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
――This is the solution I...  
The solution『Parcae』found.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
She showed me the screen of that laptop she always carried 
around.

It was lined with complex formula upon complex formula, 
symbols upon symbols, leading to a single value to the right of 
the final equal sign――

That number's always been there, ever since I first ran the code. 
The answer doesn't change. What that value represents is...
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
I'm going to lose the Japanese Derby by seven centimeters, 
and lose my shot at the Triple Crown. That's the solution.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown... Three G1 races one can only enter in her 
Classic year. The "Satsuki Sho", the "Japanese Derby", and 
the "Kikka Sho".

These races' winners are dubbed “Triple Crown Umamusume”, 
carving their names into history. Countless challengers have tried 
and failed to join the few who could be counted on one hand.

I will never take the Triple Crown. Time and again, I've rerun the 
numbers, but never cracked a way to overcome this result.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Don't even suggest there's something wrong with the program. 
It's perfect. And because it's perfect... 
I know for a fact I'll never win.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Got it now? Look how powerless you are to help.
Even I can't do a damn thing about it.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
I couldn't hope to understand the depths of her despair. 
But at the very least, I could understand why she was struggling 
so fiercely. It was simple―
choice_data_list: You still want to win, don't you?
You still want to win, don't you?

text_block_list.text: ...Huh?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
I wanted to know her wish, and there it was― 
To win. A simple wish shared by just about anyone...
choice_data_list: <size=30>If you hold on to that wish, you can change that result!</size>

text_block_list.text: ...Ghh.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
If thinking and wishing was all it took! 
I'd've done it already, dammit!
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Struggling and fighting, over and over... Running the numbers again, and again, and again, and again, and again! Knowing it's all in vain!
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Running, running, running more! Hoping one day, one day... All for nothing. And then a know-nothing like you...
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Just showing up out of nowhere, getting it twisted with that savior complex!! What the hell... do you think you can do...?!
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Her rage and sorrow were clear. Her hopeless outlook was seated 
deep in her life's experience, I'm sure. I had no right to invalidate 
it. But――
choice_data_list: (I haven't even tried to help her yet!)
(I haven't even tried to help her yet!)

text_block_list.text:
...Well, that's how it is. If you got it, don't try to get involved 
again.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=41>(...I have to get to know her better first.)</size>

text_block_list.text:
Though she rejected me, though I hadn't done anything for her, 
I still didn't want to back down.
